amendment.description: To provide for the establishment of the USS Oklahoma Memorial.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1388 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1388 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S12497-12513) To provide for the establishment of the USS Oklahoma Memorial.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1388 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1388 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe.
